document_data.name: ''Goggles of Minute Seeing''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Goggles of minute seeing''''' were [[enchanted]] [[Lantan]]ese [[helmet]]s, often used by the island's archeologists.
document_data.Description: Goggles in name only, these magical helmets, or more precisely, metallurgist's faceguard helms, were designed in a distinctly Lantanese fashion. The helmet's front had an intricate series of [[lense]]s that could be rotated and placed in front of the wearer's eyes.
document_data.Powers: The helmet's lenses allowed the wearer to see even the smallest details up-close. These magic lenses made the ''goggles of minute seeing'' invaluable when examining one's environment or trying to identify strange and possibly dangerous items.
document_data.History:
This particular type of helmet was created in Lantan to be used by archeologists when dealing with various contraptions of old. By the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], these helmets gained some popularity along the [[Sword Coast]] and even the [[Nelanther Isles]].

As of the late 15{{th}} century DR, versions of the ''goggles'' existed with applications in combat.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Naomlen Girdaur]], a [[dwarven]] [[rogue]] active in Waterdeep in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
